title: Learn with Isaac
text:
This is my growing collection of lessons, notes, and explorations in data science, machine learning, and deep learning.

ğŸ“˜ These notes are part personal study guide, part public resource â€” feel free to browse, share, or build upon them.

Share insights and resources with anyone interested in learning
